dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Cool. So do you know what harmony is?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: It's when people sing together and it sounds nice.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Yeah, that's 100% correct. Have you ever heard a song called Amazing Grace?

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: It's a good one. The melody on its own just goes. (hums Amazing Grace) That melody on its own is kind of lonely, right? And no one really knows how it feels. (plays and hums Amazing Grace) So which one did you prefer?

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: [Jacob] Awesome. And why did you prefer that one?

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Yeah, ah, that's great. I can decide how I want this melody to feel and the more notes there are, the more exciting it is. That's what musical harmony is. Does that make sense?
